entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
